message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.CR, cs.NE 

The paper proposes a technique to improve the robustness of neural networks to adversarial examples using a generative adversarial network. This technique is applied to supervised learning for CIFAR datasets. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition), and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also deals with the security aspect of neural networks by defending against adversarial perturbations, which falls under the sub-category cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). Finally, the paper uses a GAN to improve supervised learning, which is related to the sub-category cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
